item.title: AMD CEO Lisa Su Isn’t Afraid of the Competition
item.description: In this episode of Uncanny Valley we take you through our recent conversation with Lisa Su and go behind the scenes of our Big Interview event.

item.title: Why SpaceX Is Finally Gearing Up to Go Public
item.description: Like so many things in Elon Musk's orbit, a lot of it may come down to AI.

item.title: This Group Pays Bounties to Repair Broken Devices—Even If the Fix Breaks the Law
item.description: Fulu sets repair bounties on consumer products that employ sneaky features that limit user control. Just this week, it awarded more than $10,000 to th...

item.title: You’re Thinking About AI and Water All Wrong
item.description: Fears about AI data centers’ water use have exploded. Experts say the reality is far more complicated than people think.

item.title: The Best Age-Tech Gadgets Tried and Tested by WIRED
item.description: As more and more age tech hits the market, I’ve been testing the most innovative gadgets for older folks and caregivers.
